Container.Name: Guacamole - guacd
Container.Changes: [center][font size=4]Guacamole Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=3]2017.09.15[/font] - Initial Release
Container.Overview: Provides the guacd daemon, built from the released guacamole-server source with support for VNC, RDP, SSH, and telnet.
Container.Description: Provides the guacd daemon, built from the released guacamole-server source with support for VNC, RDP, SSH, and telnet.
